      • moveIsValid

        public boolean moveIsValid(int si,
                           int sj,
                           int di,
                           int dj,
                           BoardLocation[][] locations)
        Determines all possible moves associated with the current board location of this object
        Specified by:
        moveIsValid in class ChessPiece
        Parameters:
        si - The current horizontal board location of this object
        sj - The current vertical board location of this object
        di - The desired horizontal board location of this object
        dj - The desired vertical board location of this object
        locations - The current state of the board including all active pieces
        Returns:
        Returns a boolean determining whether or not the move is valid
